website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few small downsides, the Samsung Level U Pro is one of the better sounding collar-style Bluetooth headphones and offers a comfortable fit.
pros: The Samsung Level U Pro is a lightweight, sweat-resistant wireless Bluetooth headphone offers offers a comfortable fit and is one of the better sounding Bluetooth headphones with an around-the-neck design
It vibrates when a call comes in and has well-placed buttons
cons: Buds look and feel a little cheap
It would have been nice if Samsung had included its Stabilizing Wing Ear Gels to lock the 'buds in your ears while running
There's a bit of treble push

customer_reviews.title: Broke within two months.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product for the 1st month I owned it. Works great for listening to music at my desk. Then it broke. The neck comes in 3 pieces which are glued together. The glue is apparently quite weak, and the pieces have separated from each other. This makes the whole unit pretty worthless. I was not rough on it at all. Just wore it at my office. One day I picked it up and it fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Right earbud not working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair and once again the right earbud loses about 80% of its volume effectively making it useless. I only use them two days a week and after two months this happened. I was actually listening to them when it happened, over a period of about a minute it lost its volume. I would love to know why this keeps happening.
customer_reviews.author: Hayden Rudd

customer_reviews.title: NO WARRANTY SUPPORT FOR AMAZON PURCHASES
customer_reviews.text: First off, DO NOT BUY THESE THROUGH AMAZON I just got off the phone with a very pleasant woman who explained that their policy is to not do warranty repairs on Amazon purchases. I have had my pair since February and the volume quality has dropped so low that I can barely hear anything anymore with both the phone and headset volumes at maximum. I have no idea how this happened and I am not going to be finding out any time soon. I am now out the cost of the headset and I will try not to throw them out the window. This policy is ridiculous and should be openly stated.
customer_reviews.author: Jeb Stuart Johnston

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are total garbage. Bluetooth doesn't work. Cuts out every 2 seconds. It was impossible to use them. Maybe I just got a defective product. But read all the 1 star reviews before you decide to buy. I returned them for a refund and I got these headphones instead. They are so much better, there's no comparison.  Their bluetooth works great, I can listen from another room 30 feet away from my phone. The sound is clean. The battery lasts 8 hours. I bought them for my wife, then I used them for exercise and I really liked them, so I'm buying another one for myself. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: JB122

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: These sound great for music and movies. They sound absolutely awesome with the Power Amp app for Android. Haven't used them yet during a phone call, will update on that later. Very comfortable. Update 1/2/18, call quality is very good on both ends. I installed Comply Foam earbuds for comfort, the ones that came with them were uncomfortable after an hour. Update 1/4/18 I tried to register these at Samsung US and they wouldn't let me, they were either purchased out of the US or are more than 3 years old. I just bought them. They do sound great though, hopefully I won't need warranty service.
customer_reviews.author: ErwinKennedy

customer_reviews.title: GO with the Level U
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I almost prefer the original level U. I got these as a replacement to those. But the others were a bit more comfortable to wear. Further, talking on the phone was easier... the "in-ear" design of these makes using them for phone conversations a bit awkward and uncomfortable over long periods of time. I also feel as if I'm charging them more often than I did with the original ones. The sound quality for music is great, but for that, i have a pair of Bose. They're just ok at the price, but aside from the gimmick of having music/calls pause and unpause when the earbuds are together, I'd go with the Level U.
customer_reviews.author: DJKTenX

customer_reviews.title: Fix the Connection issues and they're perfect
customer_reviews.text: First off I loved these. Sound quality was great, comfortable, but the connection issues nullified all the good parts about it. If I was walking, had my phone in my pocket, or anything other than the source unit less than 3 ft away and not moving, it had the worst connection ever and made the headphones useless. Very disappointed these didn't work out, they met all my expectations, except the ability to connect, which makes them 1 star. I know it wasn't my phone, because I tried several Bluetooth sources, all with the same results. If they fix this issue these would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: warriorseries

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Level U Pro Bluetooth Headset- Great Headset for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great headset! I got this for my birthday and have used them daily. They are great when listening to music, making calls, notifications, and much more. Pros: Great headset that provides excellent battery life, listening and noise cancelling, and quality of functionality. Cons: The design isn't the most comfortable of all. They can become irritating at times. Cable comes un magnetized and the buds dangle after that. Strong magnets, but it doesn't work all the time. I work in IT and I had to have something work for me on the job.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Armour

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased these with the view of them sounding really good I only gave it a 3-star though because I ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a Samsung purchaser so I purchased these with the view of them sounding really good I only gave it a 3-star though because I judge all my headphones by my motorcycle ride and these didn't cut it, you can't hear Too Well but I kept them because it's still a good sound not good for the gym cuz they fall off if you're doing jumping jacks or jump rope, but they still are fairly good quality I like the easy access to the function buttons
customer_reviews.author: B Me

customer_reviews.title: All in all, I can't complain, it's a good headset, especially once you factor in cost.
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable, the audio quality is good; but not great. You need a Samsung device in order to take advantage of the UHQ technology. The Samsung Level app (Android) is pretty good, it gives you EQ settings, a few special effects like "3D", Bass, and "Clarity". It allows you to see the battery level, set volume levels, and an audio share feature to connect more than one Level device to your phone at a time so multiple people can listen. It does not include a case or charger. It provides a micro-USB cable so you can use another USB charger / USB port.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: overall a very well made around the neck earbud. Very impressive
customer_reviews.text: Nothing negative to say about these. For the money these things are a great value (especially for samsung users, they can have 2 people listening at same time). The app provides an excellent customizable sound equalizer. Battery life lasts me 3 days of normal use at the office. Cords are solid and you need not fear of pulling on them a little by accident and breaking them (unlike other retractable versions). Sounds fantastic and fits solid.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Samsung galaxy phone and could only find the best sound quality from a pair of corded earbuds. This Bluetooth is great. It's user friendly and I can hear the caller. the caller can hear me clearly and not my background. The only flaw I found was that the speaker is on top on the right side. Be careful not cover that little opening and you will be fine. there are times when mine will shift while around my neck and that opening is under my chin. Otherwise this Bluetooth is great. Long talk and standby time and charger included.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B

customer_reviews.title: A No-Brainer for Samsung Device Owners
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent BT device and even more exceptional when considering the low price. I've got mine paired with a Galaxy S7 Edge and it's worked flawlessly so far. No skipping or connectivity issues. Download the Level U app and have easier audio control, including a dial for the device volume and a spot holder for your favorite music apps. I turned on the UHQ but I'm not sure I can tell a difference because my source material bitrate is limited (MP3's, etc.) If you have a compatible Samsung device, I don't think there's a better option for BT hi-fi stereo for the price.
customer_reviews.author: R.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Only one thing I don't like about it
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the sound is great, and the build quality is nice and sturdy. Battery lasts as long as expected, and the magnetic earpieces work really well. The only thing I don't like is how the volume levels for the device and for your phone are separate. With the original Level U's, if you pressed the volume buttons on the neckband, it would change your media volume levels on your phone. With these, you can even see in the Level app that there are 2 separate volume levels. Some people prefer this, I don't, so I wish there was an option to change it. Other than that minor issue, they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Great sound; comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Although I'm still not completely sold on collar headphones, the Samsung Level U Pro is very comfortable to wear and provides very good sound, whether I'm listening to my own music from my cellphone (Samsung Galaxy S7--ogg recordings), Spotify/Pandora, or a connected television monitor at the gym. Because of concern regarding its durability when not in use, I bought the, which, while bulkier than I'd prefer, does the job.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Guberman

customer_reviews.title: This version is a big no for me ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what happened, maybe I got a defective pair but these are bad ... just overall bad. The sound quality is terrible and it's barely audible even on the highest setting. I've had previous versions and never had this issue. I'm pretty positive this particular pair were either defective or a return due to the poor quality. Even the plastic started splitting and falling apart in the first month. I should've returned them but I lost the box. Overall, a fail. The previous version I kept for almost 2yrs but these have not survived 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: CP83

customer_reviews.title: 2 years and still working perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in April 2017 and have used them virtually every day since. These sit perfectly in the neck and are so comfortable that I often forget they are there. The sound quality is wonderful, they are great for phone calls (I have an iPhone). I have never had a problem with these... bought a set for my son who also loves his. I paid under $40 originally and am now not sure why they are $80, but I honestly can’t recommend them enough.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy M

customer_reviews.title: Great audio, unusable mic
customer_reviews.text: Use this for running and talking on the phone. It works great for the audio. No one I talk to can hear me with the mic. I don't know if it is poor location, design, or issue with the mic but it is unusable as a communication tool. The design is weird. I've used the LG version of this type of bluetooth headset and the ear pieces fit into the end of the neck hardware. On this one, the ear pieces dangle if not in your ear. It's not my favorite design for sure. Between the mic not being usable and the weird design I would suggest going in a different direction. Samsung dropped the ball here.
customer_reviews.author: J Davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazin Sound quality when paid with a galaxy! 10/10 *mic only OK
customer_reviews.text: These are the best SQ headphones/ headset I have ever used. It blows the doors off my old B&O play phones & lg v20. I can't believe these sound so good with my note 9 and Spotify on HQ streaming and Flac files. Microphone quality is kinda muddy dare I say very muffled, but it doesn't pick up every little sound like my B&O, senheisers, Sony, and jbl headset. Beats the sh*t out of LGs "hi fi" headsets and several no name knock offs I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: rittalout

customer_reviews.title: A Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I settled for this rather cumbersome design due to the price. However, I should have been suspicious of the surprising number of sites offering it refurbished: The left ear bud stopped working after a little more than a month - days after the return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: Craig B

customer_reviews.title: Good pricing for a quality headset
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't come with active noise cancellation but it's earbud is designed such that it has some background noise reduction effect. The battery life is pretty impressive, I used it for 2 days with at least 2 hrs audio per day and sporadic phone calls throughout the day. It is extremely easy to couple but it can only connect to one device at one time. The sound itself is rather soft when I am in a loud place like the airplane, but it is sufficient enough for regular walking around the beach. I don't think this is very comfortable to wear for sports though, when I ran with it, it has this tendency to slip off my neck.
customer_reviews.author: kt

customer_reviews.title: falling  apart ,will no longer charge, never worked as described out of box
customer_reviews.text: My last set of the exact same Samsung level pro , worked perfectly over 4 years , so I purchased them again . Major disappointment when within 2 months body separated and controls fell out . Item still worked thru phone. and now has just completely quit , (will not even show light as to charging ) Truly a disappointment from the set 4 years ago. Samsung does not even acknowledge the ID #'s on the item , so they were defective returns refurbished and sold as new. Amazon does not even provide a return option on the item.
customer_reviews.author: doug gulb

customer_reviews.title: I would like to give this pair 5 stars but there is a design flaw
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice wireless headphones. I love everything about them. I would give them 5 stars but here's the design flaw; Like many people, I like to go to sleep listening to music, podcasts, or even watching tv while listening through these headphones. The problem is that when the battery dies, the headphones vibrate and buzz in your ear making it impossible to go to sleep while using these headphones. What is the point of buzzing when it dies, we can guess that it needs to be charged when it fails to power off.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Great for bluetooth headset for calls
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They work awesome with my Galaxay Note 8. I didn't buy these to use for music. I bought to use to take phone calls at work. It works great. The earpieces are magnetic. So they stick together and when you get a phone call to answer all you have to do is separate the ear pieces and put them in your ear. It is genius. Not button to push. It is so slick. For the money the music quality is not bad. I would not recommend these for working out or running. They bounce around and fall off too much for that.
customer_reviews.author: Kory Holding

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound - Bad Connectivity
customer_reviews.text: I like the sound of these headphones and there are enough tips in the package to get a good seal in the ear but when listening to music I hear frequent drops, enough to make me go back to using my old wired headphones. I bought these mostly for use at work with my phone sitting on my desk nearby so it's not a range issue. I've tried moving my phone around to find a better position but these skip no matter what. For reference I'm using a Galaxy S7 Edge phone that works perfectly with my other bluetooth devices.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Not made by samsung
customer_reviews.text: Samsung loyalist. Love samsung products. They stopped making these around 3 or4 years ago, and will not honor warranty. Amazon now makes and sells this product, which will fall apart in under 6 months guaranteed. Hope this saves you the frustration I dealt with.
customer_reviews.author: Hard worker.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset I wear it everyday and I've had them since January. The sound quality is really good and it's very light weight. The ONLY issue I have with it is the ear buds being free flowing. Even locked together with the magnets I have caught them on stuff. They haven't broke but I could see that happening if not careful. But I'm happy I got them over other brands they work great for my needs which are talking on the phone and listening to books/music. The features are also great.
customer_reviews.author: KaCee Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not enough volume
customer_reviews.text: The Level U Pro sounds excellent - except for one thing - the volume is not loud enough. By that I mean, I can stand by my TV at normal volume and hear my TV over my music. I have tried all the adjustments and EQ settings. Can someone tell me I'm doing something wrong? If I could up the volume, these earphones would rate 5 stars easily. I'm trying apps that amp up volume but not having luck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe A

customer_reviews.title: I love Samsung products and these worked great until they fell ...
customer_reviews.text: These were delivered and I began using them a few days later. I keep them safe in a hard container so as not to damage them when not in use. So 2 days ago, less than a month after using only during the work week when driving, the left ear piece popped off and is dangling by wires. As much as these cost you would think they would last more than 3 1/2 weeks. I love Samsung products and these worked great until they fell apart but this one is not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma BJ

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 3 months, then Warranty not honored
customer_reviews.text: I've been using for several months. I don't like that has only 3 physical buttons, so need to hold for 1sec to skip forward. To skip 30 seconds, takes 6 sec; just annoying. NOW however I found the sound to have gotten SO low even when maxed out that I can hardly hear. Sending back to Samsung. UPDATE: Samsung is refusing warranty exchange because Amazon doesn't show serial number on proof of purchase. Buyer beware, warranty not honored
customer_reviews.author: B. Koehn

customer_reviews.title: If you want to use for phone calls, find SOMETHING ELSE
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality for music? Awesome Comfort around neck? Awesome Ease of use? Awesome Used for phone calls? worst thing ever - "you sound like you're in a tunnel" - "I can hear that person better than you" and they're on the other side of an office - "I can hear your keyboard 10x louder than you" If you're looking to use this headset for any other reason besides phone calls, they're great. But I bought this for the SOUL purpose of phone calls....and 3 months in it never got better
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: These are okay. Maybe save your money for a better Bluetooth headset.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back in June of 2017. Figured now was good enough time to give it a rating. They're pretty decent. haven't had them break on me yet. Battery life is decent enough, considering the size. Had a pair of LG Tone + and noticed that the LG's had a bit better range through walls than the Level U Pro. Biggest complaint I have is the audio going to my right side is noticeably lower than than the left now. Otherwise, not a bad product. Would probably save money for a better quality headset, but these are okay.
customer_reviews.author: Novis

customer_reviews.title: Battery life champ.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, the battery life is awesome. At work, at play and on the run or ride..... These will do fine. My right ear piece, at full charge, will take about​ half an hour to kick in. Loose cables are a bit anoying but you kind of get use to them. Distance from source is about forty yards and sound of way above acceptable. Got the black ones, more like deep, deep blackish blue... I don't mind. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Works really good and despite that this is the version without active noise cancelling, once that you are listening to music you reduce almost every regular ambient noise (transit, people talking, and those kind of things). The Bluetooth connectivity works good near the source of sound, however it does not have a lot of reach. The battery works as expected for a item of this dimensions, I use them a lot so I always have to charging them at night and then another time in the afternoon. For me the issues with the battery and the bluetooth reach are not a problem, so I'm happy with the overall performance and sound quality of the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE S.

customer_reviews.title: Loved it. But broke on the left side curve.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Level U Pro Bluetooth!! I’ve had my current one for a year Apr. 3 and sound quality is great, the battery lasts for days, I use mine several times throughout the day for a minimum of an hour and constantly forget to turn it off. My only complaint is that like the first one I ever had (hand me down not sure how old it was) it broke on the curve after one year. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Popp

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth headset !
customer_reviews.text: Great bluetooth headset ! Pro : 1. Decent sound in this price 2. Volume was great 3. Noise isolation earbuds is fine and prefect fit for me 4. Comfortable wear 5. Good battery life 6. Easy pair 7. Original software for custom setting 8. Noise-canceling worked well, very clear voice for phone call quality Cons : 1. Not for sports 2. Not good looking earbuds 3. Not true wirless
customer_reviews.author: Sygate

customer_reviews.title: battery died in less than a year, not replaceable. still a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic and durable! best sounding headset I have ever worn, super comfy (I had to buy larger earbuds) The battery died young, as my purchase was from old stock. these batteries are state-of-the-art, not available through eBay or Alibaba. 400mAh, not 220mAH as sold on eBay.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D. Wall

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth earbud headphones I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: I did not know how amazing Bluetooth headphones would be for me. Really a big change. Especially with this, considering it is really solid and sounds amazing. This may be more on the expensive side, but Samsung's warranty on this is great, so at least it is hassle free if something were to ever happen. Fits on your neck really well and the mic sounds very good as well. Definitely, recommend this product for someone who wants quality Bluetooth earbud headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for around the neck
customer_reviews.text: These are great and sound great. They have wonderful battery life and will definitely do the job if you are good with around the neck earbuds. My problem is that the plastic material of the body tends to slide around my dress shirt collar and does not stay in place at all, but you might use it on your bare neck, in which case that will be a non-issue and you will love these.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth to Samsung Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these with a discount code. That said, I'm disappointed. I use them to watch TV and not disturb the business next door. I can't walk across my (small) apartment living room and not lose signal - unless I balance them on top of my head. Ya, no. The volume also has a set limit which is a little too low for me. My cheap pair have better range and higher volume. I wouldn't get these again.
customer_reviews.author: DFR

customer_reviews.title: Great design and quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my wife. She loves them! Clear sound for her. Hands free conversation for her. Quieter and less disruptive phone calls with her friends as she doesn't speak as loudly as when holding the phone to one ear. The auto answer when pulling the magnetic ear buds apart is a slick feature too. This purchase made the top of the list for most enjoyed birthday gifts this year.
customer_reviews.author: MCHOUSE

customer_reviews.title: Liked them a lot, initially. Now, not so much since they broke.
customer_reviews.text: Really like these. Saw some complaints about volume too low in other reviews, but I find the volume just fine, and if I need to drown out the roar of the ferry engine, I can do that too. I leave them on all day, when not in use, and totally forget they're around my neck. And it sure beats tangling with a tangled cord. Update: I really did like them while they lasted -- for about a year. Then, the earphone end fell apart, wires got dislodged and it no longer functions. I would've expected them to last a bit longer. Now, debating whether to buy new ones, or find something else.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: This headset is not truly a samsung authenticate headset.
customer_reviews.text: This is not an authenticate Samsung headset. I am really upset because i purchased one from amazon before and it was authenticate. How i can tell its not authenticate. When i pair it with my amazon app it says headset instead of samsung. Also, when i went to take the headphone apart to answer a call it didnt answer it. I had to go find my phone to actually answer the phone. I am so upset. Make sure you get the headphone from samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The original level U fits great in the ear and bass is much better
customer_reviews.text: Picked these up to replace my original level U headphones that actually still work. Build quality is top notch and so far no breakage. The fit of the little rubber ear pods just don't fit well for me, tried all the sizes and ran with a larger on on the right and a smaller one on the left. Bass is almost non existent and I assume that is because I can't get them to seal in my ear correctly. The original level U fits great in the ear and bass is much better. I ordered a replacement just in case I received a defective pair. Will update when they arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Greg ottria

customer_reviews.title: They connect with my samsung phone just fine -- but won't connect wirelessly to my kindle oasis
customer_reviews.text: These are twitchy. They connect with my samsung phone just fine -- but won't connect wirelessly to my kindle oasis. the sound quality and comfort for the gym are really good.. but it bugs me that they don't connect the way that their technology suggests that they would. I know there is a newer version -- perhaps that one has the quirks worked out.
customer_reviews.author: A. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I use primarily for work and calls while driving. My daughter's dog ate my first pair that i had for 3 years so i thought I'd try a more modern style, no one could hear me. Found these and at a really good price and couldn't be happier. Decent sound quality but everyone can hear me. Clear call quality. Long battery life. Stays on neck. What more could you want for this kind of use. Wouldn't recommend for the gym though because they dont quite stay snug in my ears. Overall its a quality product and works well.
customer_reviews.author: noname

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but NOT LOUD!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for when I'm doing yard work and dont want to get the headphone cord tangled. You can barely hear the music over the lawn mower, I'd imagine a train or airplane would be the same scenario. So they're good for listening in a relatively quite environment, but if there's background noise...forget about it!
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: good. dont buy the non- pros they break like ...
customer_reviews.text: good. dont buy the non- pros they break like nothing. the pros have improves sound quality stronger connectivity, and are much more durable. the budget headset i recommend, at $42.00(at time of review) this thing is massive value. once you get into $100+ territory you want the bose woundsports.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent range and sound! Consider wear requirements, though.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is terrific. Bass response is really good. Range is extensive compared to my MPOW jaws and those are good. Charge lasts all day for me. Only problem is the rigid contour neck design and placement of ear-buds is a bit wonky. I wear a clean-room outfit and the piece tends to want to creep out the top of my cleanroom wear. The placement of the on-off makes it difficult to access while wearing them. Better for outside wear but I need the noise isolation (really good with Level) in my work environment.
customer_reviews.author: Ancient_Sinner

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Cellular Gaming --- Not So Much For Calls
customer_reviews.text: Use for gaming via DISCORD on my Android Note Edge. Works and sounds great for music and games. Can voice control my phone with it and have made calls with it, but some people complain about the quality of sound on the call. My Motorola Roadster ll does not get any complaints, but then it is not a set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: The Honest Critique

customer_reviews.title: Great Until it Dies Prematurely
customer_reviews.text: The best headphones I ever had, until they weren't! Died after 7 months of regular use. Will no longer hold a charge and it is impossible to get a hold of anyone at Samsung who will process a warranty claim (feels as if this is by design.) The retailer washes his hands of any responsibility, since it is more than 30 days old! Don't waste your time with this product and don't risk buying anything from this retailer!
customer_reviews.author: AtlantaShopper

customer_reviews.title: Good for daily life
customer_reviews.text: Having the previous version (Samsung level U) the in ear design is way better. These buds don't fall out unless I go on a run. Would recommend for gym use, have sweated heavily and they still function perfectly. The supposed hardened design everyone complains about, does not affect me what so ever. As with the previous version, after a while I forget I have them on. People just like to talk negatively in order to get something out of it. Good job Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is like jamming. At that time
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my mobile. Galaxy note 5. But When i am walking with my mobile in my pants' pocket. It occurs some noise or intermittent data loss. It is like jamming. At that time, if the wi-fi turned on, It is more frequently occured. But it is still fine when i bring mobile with my side pocket of backpack. So, i just use like that. Anyway, the appearance is fine. and sound quality is similar or better than other samsung's bundle earphones. For calling, i asked to my opponent about my speaking, they said it is fine. Overall, I think it is worthy for this price. (Maybe I'll buy again, up to $40)
customer_reviews.author: Seokjun Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great pairing and great hearing
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough excellent things about these bluetooth ear phones. I was able to get it hooked up without difficulty and I down loaded the app Samsung Level which allows you to pick special features for the ear phones. I can clearly hear my phone calls and music and not one person has said they cannot hear me. I love these and would buy them in gold if I had the money.
customer_reviews.author: Yarnfinder

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth Issues
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, there are bluetooth issues with this product. My headset will not stay connected to my devices. This issue is not isolated to me, and is not user error. Do a quick Google search and see for yourself, of check the other negative reviews. It's really too bad, because they are comfortable and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Dan C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Calls, not so much for music
customer_reviews.text: I love this headset, its great for calls - the sound is clear and crisp - and wearing it is comfortable. The only thing I don't like is the sound quality when playing music. I used the app that goes with the headset and played with the settings and got it to a point of being just OK.... but not better than that. If it weren't for the music settings being sub-par I would give this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: KaraBearz

customer_reviews.title: Broke after only 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: So my picture says most of it, but other considerations include the fact that all the weight is behind your neck. Doing situps or other similar exercises? Will fall off. Doing a lot of bending, stopping, or reaching? Probably will fall off. About the only thing this is good for is cycling? Maybe? Elliptical? Won't buy again. Going back to LG Tone ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Tomakitty

customer_reviews.title: Bought this last week (black) and used it exclusively during ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this last week (black) and used it exclusively during trips to Miami and Houston. On the plane, in the hotel, on the beach, by the pool - it excelled. Didn't ever need to break out my wired paired OR my noise-cancelling Bose headset. I don't think this advertises noise cancellation, but I could barely hear anything else besides the movies and music I was listening to during my flights. Used it with a Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge.
customer_reviews.author: BriGuy

customer_reviews.title: The neckband sucks
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months the neckband broke. I did not abuse these things, actually I was quite careful with them. I bought these to replace the LG Tones I had for over a year, I thought these would be better since I had a Samsung S6 phone but I was wrong. When listening to music or a video most of the time you hear a crackling noise which is very annoying the sound quality was so so. I would not recommend buying these. I expected better from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are the worst... and why not usb-c?
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst. The magnet feature seemed fine at first but its a pain in the ass when taking off. The bluetooth link dropped in and out when phone was in hip pocket, and would drop out entirely when in a cargo pocket. impossible to say in good faith these are high fidelity. Not usb-c. Not as comfy or convenient as the LG tone. The samsung app is also ineffective (on a galaxy s9). Unimpressed.
customer_reviews.author: ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, this is second time i ordered this type ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed,this is second time i ordered this type of earphones, first time was just great ,but now ordered black came on blue and looks like not original,one more sticker on top of the original one not ive been waiting for. 1 star,Update after one week of use microphone not working properly, noise cancellation seems to be broken so upset and can't send them back i am on road,
customer_reviews.author: igo

customer_reviews.title: A great headset for the money
customer_reviews.text: The audio quality is great compared to two other ~$30 bluetooth earbuds I've owned. It's comfortable to wear all day, and I sometimes forget that I even have it around my neck. It can easily be hidden under a shirt collar. The samsung app is very customizable and well thought out. I get great range, too. zero complaints!
customer_reviews.author: a t.

customer_reviews.title: Five stars for comfort, sound quality, ease of setup, and sturdiness.
customer_reviews.text: Like you're wearing nothing. Sound quality is excellent. Paired immediately without tinkering with my settings. I just had to add it as a playback device by right-clicking on the Volume icon. Every time the PC senses it, it automatically reconnects. I use it a lot at night in bed so I don't disturb my wife. A lot of times I fall asleep and get up in the morning not even aware the band is still around my neck. I wasn't sure how these neckband/headphones feel. Now I'm glad I made the decision to buy one. It feels very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CA Storm

customer_reviews.title: They've been used...
customer_reviews.text: These have been OBVIOUSLY used! There is ear wax in both ear pieces and there was some sort of hair wrapped around one of the ear pieces. This is disgusting! It was supposed to be a Christmas present but I cant possible give these as a present! Now I'm down one gift... waste of time and money... just got them today and will be returning first thing tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Randal Navarro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bluetooth headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I spent FOREVER looking for a set of Bluetooth headphones with good reviews, and I really didn't want to spend a whole lot of money. The reviews on these were pretty good so I thought I would take a chance. Boy, am I glad! I'm always near a charger so what was important for me was good sound quality. And these sound amazing when being used with an iPhone 7. They definitely sound better than the stock wired earbuds it comes with. I'm very glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great until they stop charging or pairing
customer_reviews.text: I’m devastated. This is my second pair of these. My first pair lasted 2 years. My favorite pair of headphones for long distance running. After 2 years they died. Would not charge or pair to my phone. That’s understandable with wear and tear..... So I ordered them again I loved them so much. Within 2 months and not even 10 uses the same thing has happened. They will not charge. It will pair to my phone for a Max of 10 seconds at a time. I am devastated.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette Dooley

customer_reviews.title: $35 well spent
customer_reviews.text: I saw these were on sale for $35 so I picked them up to pair with my S8+. The volume isn't that loud but it's​ loud enough you will enjoy it, don't expect really loud sound. Also if you tune the bass/tremble to your preference they sound pretty good. For $35 I'm happy, I just got back from the park and did some sprinting and they stayed in my ear perfectly (surprised). I would recommend but no more than $60.
customer_reviews.author: Jarron Davis

customer_reviews.title: Mic is useless for conversations
customer_reviews.text: The internal processors on this headset that facilitate your discussions is not powerful enough - the results are people cannot hear you, muffled, intermittent slow/slurred speaking. Consistently, switch from the headset, back to the phone - immediately, people on the other end of the conversation suddenly hear you load and clear. Now, have to fight the limited warranty battle with Samsung...
customer_reviews.author: CPMac

customer_reviews.title: Great for making calls... People didn't know the difference when I was using the handset or the bluetooth...
customer_reviews.text: Great call Quality... Better than alot of other head phones I used in this form factor ... However when listen to music it's low and tinny.. .I don't understand how this was meant for a high quality listening experience... Conclusion if making calls is your priority this is the best headset for you. It feels study and durable it's even slash resistant it's a great product but..... Audio quality is subpar to say the least...
customer_reviews.author: sokchanthy

customer_reviews.title: okay
customer_reviews.text: It is Samsung's fault, their product was very confusing, I thought this earphone has a noise cancellation... But it is different from what I was looking for. Read the ad twice to make sure to get what you are looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Sean B.

customer_reviews.title: Trust the other reviewers...
customer_reviews.text: As the others have stated, one ear bud went out. I am highly disappointed as I have come to love Samsung products over the last 18 years since I got my first cell phone with them in 2000. I think there is a malfunction in this series and this seller is refurbishing them just enough where they work for about 5 days and then kaput. The sound quality is amazing though... When it works.
customer_reviews.author: Deserea M.

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from refurbished.  Buy new.
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones, but dont buy refurbished. The headphones constantly pause the music for some reason. Something is seriously wrong. Completely random in any situation. Once it paused and then played again. I have no idea why or how its happening.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Miller

customer_reviews.title: Probably actually about 2.25 stars
customer_reviews.text: It is just barely good enough. The weight is a little too far back so it will fall off sometimes. It disconnects itself from the phone a couple times a month and needs to be re-paired. It usually has decent reception. The battery is almost big enough for a days use. The integration with my Samsung phone is not as good as it should be. If you listen to podcasts you have to hold the volume button for a couple seconds for it to skip ahead/back which is annoying if you have a bunch of ads.
customer_reviews.author: aaa

customer_reviews.title: Below average voice calls and Music quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this especially for phone calls as this is has dual mic but did not function as expected. people on other end could still hear considerable background noise and also voice/music in earbuds in comparatively low and less clear than other earbuds I am currently using. I have Samsung device but did not experience any difference , on the contrary my budget earbuds have better sound output than this when paired with my Samsung mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav Nandanwar

customer_reviews.title: Amazing when there is no frequency interference
customer_reviews.text: For the price the sound quality with the UHQ audio is absolutely insane. They sound SOOOOOO Good. But... they are extremely susceptible to frequency interference which causes a terrible "cracking and popping" sound which is akin to a CD "skipping" Its so bad I legitimately had to remove 2 stars from my review.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: I WEAR THESE EVERY DAY
customer_reviews.text: THESE THINGS ARE GREAT, I'VE HAD THEM FOR ABOUT A YEAR NOW. THEY HAVE NOT FALLEN APART, BUT I DON'T BEAT THEM UP EITHER. SOUND IS GREAT, AND ONLY A FEW PEOPLE, AND JUST SPECIFIC PEOPLE CANT HEAR ME CLEARLY FOR SOME REASON. BUT NO COMPLAINTS FROM EVERYONE ELSE.
customer_reviews.author: C. PAYTON

customer_reviews.title: Headphones not working.
customer_reviews.text: Hello i love these headphones but one side of the earpiece is not working anymore. And the mic is not working i have to scream for people to hear me so please help for you can thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Stephone

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Decent sound for the money. I found the earpieces to be uncomfortable after only a short time of listening (about 20-30 mins). I probably would have kept them as they paired with my Note 5. HOWEVER, I broke that phone after only having the earphones for a couple of weeks. I upgraded to the Samsung S8 and this product is NOT compatible with that device. As usual, Amazon immediately credited my account after sending me a prepaid shipping label and the package was scanned. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, little problem with the Level U app ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, little problem with the Level U app on phone as it doesn't keep the UHQ Audio selected upon reconnecting, even if defaulting it in the settings, but the actual headphones are great! No complaints from anyone when I use them to talk on the phone either. I also like how the neck band vibrates when an incoming call is coming in as I usually don't have my phone in my pocket when working out or doing yard work.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Stop your search and purchase these. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are excellent! They blow away my old LG ones. I can't believe I've been wasting my time with LG lately when Samsung products are high quality and function as expected. If you are on the fence, spending hours researching good quality headphones then stop your search and purchase these. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to set up
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably price, decent sound quality but difficult to setup. I tried calling Samsung support for the initial setup and the rep said he didn't know how to pair it with an iPhone. Told me I should have bought a Samsung phone.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Could be great if they had an iOS app.
customer_reviews.text: When I first purchased these I had them paired up with a Samsung S7 edge and when paired with the Samsung Level app these would sound amazing. Everything would sound clear and the bass was bumping. Fast forward a few months later and now I use them with my iPhone 7. They still sound good, but Samsung doesn't offer the same app on iOS so the sound quality isn't as good. I do like that I can pair them up with my Apple Watch and play music directly from my watch to these. I would only recommend these if you were going to use them with an Android device.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Lomeli

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good earphones
customer_reviews.text: The earphones are pretty damn good. I would've rated it for higher, but the ad said it was designed for sports, but i couldn't really use it during gym or outdoor running. However, after using it for 3 years, i sold it for the higher price than i bought it for. So.... all in all, definitely a worthy purchase, at least for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nika T.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Connection Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much garbage. Not great sound quality and it constantly skips with my galaxy S8. I have a pair of cheep geega headphones that never lose connection. these thing skip if I move even a tiny bit and sometimes even if I don't move. Wouldn't recommend these things to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this for running, and sports.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones love it. It has great quality sound, and love that I can have in silence my phone, so I don't disturb people around, but if I have my headphones they vibrate, so I notice I have a call. And I just answered by separating the headphones and put in them in my ears, same to hung up I just pyth them together with the magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Raciel

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: This headphones are lightweight and the sound is good. The headphones are very comfortable. In some cases I forgot that I wear it. If I compare it to the LG TONE INFINIM HBS-900 the Level U Pro are more comfortable but the LG's sound is better and have better features. I bought this Level U Pro because I bought the LG TONE INFINIM HBS 900 and before those I bought the oldest HBS 750 and I experimented connectivity issues on both. At this moment I am very happy with my new Level U Pro . I have about three weeks and I don't have any issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Adames

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sound but VERY poor ergonomics and battery life
customer_reviews.text: Sound is excellent but has difficulty connecting with Bluetooth off and on. I'm used to the LG so having to get used to a floppy ear piece dangling around all day is an arduous task. The battery life is horrible. This product would be a 5-star rating if these things could be handled. Better Bluetooth operation and retractable and you have a perfect five star.
customer_reviews.author: YER MOM

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and weight distribution
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of samsung level headphones. In the past I was always very satisfied. This new version is built with very poor plastic quality, and the weight distribution is now completely messed up, the headphones constantly fall off my neck, when running or when performing most exercises at the gym. This was never the issue with previous models. Extremely disappointed. Will be returning most likely.
customer_reviews.author: Dominik Lasota

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Product. When it's paired with a COMPATIBLE phone ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall Good Product. When it's paired with a COMPATIBLE phone it is definitely 5 star. It is priced around the same as its competitors but performs better. It is louder than most wireless Bluetooth in the price range. I don't mind the neck band because it gives you so much more battery life. The sound is good and if you properly fit them they have a great sound suppression (I work for an airline and it can be heard through jet engines ) only if you get a good fit. If it's not a proper fit it will sound horrible.
customer_reviews.author: ce3377

customer_reviews.title: Decent unit
customer_reviews.text: I used daily for about a year...sound mic quality is good, rarely got a complaint. Volume isnt very loud from ears but I dont have the greatest hearing....adequate though. My original unit broke due to my bike falling. New unit had issue with bluetood so trying another Samsung updated unit.
customer_reviews.author: OnGuardMan

customer_reviews.title: but the headset still worked fine. Then
customer_reviews.text: The little mesh protectors came off after a couple months, but the headset still worked fine. Then, after 6 months it started shutting off 5-30 seconds after powering on (fully charged, no low-battery indicator) making them completely unusable. Currently working through Samsung's (miserable) warranty system. EDIT: Talking to an actual human from customer support now. Looks like they're going to ship me a new one. Will raise the rating backup to 4 or 5 if this goes smoothly. Before this issue I had no real issues with the headset and was pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Humble

customer_reviews.title: I love these.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these headphones, they're that good. (I have lost or broken the others .) The sound is great, the bluetooth connection picks up easily and is robust, and a charge goes a long way. Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: HUGE WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This was by far one of my biggest disappointments of 2016. I've had it for a little under 2 years. The bluetooth connection to my phone is horrendous and goes in and out even if I have my phone on my armband (sits on my bicep) and that battery only lasts for 30 minutes. HUGE WASTE OF MONEY!
customer_reviews.author: eklinke1983

customer_reviews.title: Here is an ear full
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was going to be something extravagant for myself over the traditional wired headset, but know I think this is the only way to go. I leave them on even sometimes when not using because they are not in the way. Also better over the wired ones which keep getting in the way when you are working around the house. Definitely glad I got them and would get them again if I loose these or when they wear out.
customer_reviews.author: David Syring

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones with great audio and only one issue.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Bluetooth Headset. It works great with my Samsung Galaxy S7. The audio is amazingly wonderful for Bluetooth and full of bass. It pairs up easily and has a long battery time. The only issue I have with it is that the USB charger cover doesn't stay in as well as I would have liked. I may use a bit of clear tape to hold it fully in place. It would be better if Samsung had replace the plastic cover with a rubber piece that would stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Tiberend

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Had these a little over a year and loved being hands free and it hade decent sound quality. Didn't use them everyday mostly when I ran errands. Even ordered a case to put them in to keep them protected. Still broke near the connection on the back. Now it won't work correctly. No sound on one side and charging issues. To be Samsung brand and considered a Pro product I expected it to be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't expect to be this pleased
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I didn't think I would like the level u pro as well as the previous 10 LG headsets I have owned. Boy, was I wrong! Sound quality is way better than and Tone I owned. Bass is much more responsive! Music sounds wonderful and I love that I'm able to customize the sound further with the Edge 7. I was worried that it wouldn't be love enough from all the reviews and it is plenty loud! The only thing I don't like so far is that it doesn't have controls for music.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Beasley

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a while now. They work very well with my Samsung phone. Love how they will announce incoming calls including the person's name, if they are in your address book. The battery for me last a few days. I tend to set my phone in a window for better reception when I'm home and answer my calls through the headphones. Works very well for calls.
customer_reviews.author: Spiderhider

customer_reviews.title: Buy local.
customer_reviews.text: I'll give this product 2 stars because for the time it worked I rather enjoyed it. I used it about three times a week while working and it was nice. Tonight the left speaker went from full audio to barely audible. The right speaker still works just fine. All this happened about 45 days after I received it and now I can't return or exchange it. Better off buying from a local store for that reason as well.
customer_reviews.author: Boogieman

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life
customer_reviews.text: Love these head phones, the batter life is great and the sound quality is perfect. People can hear me clearly during phone calls, and I like how you can put the head phones together and it will pause your music.
customer_reviews.author: pericles

product_meta.title: Samsung Level U Pro Bluetooth Wireless In-ear Headphones with Microphone and UHQ Audio, Black
feature_bullets: Stylish, Lightweight Design. UHQA is compatible with select Samsung Galaxy devices
Flexible Urethane Joints For A Comfortable Fit Bluetooth 4.1
